parsed.recap:
DEV: Rance's latent mage-gift exploded during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta arrived and Chose him; discovered red robes hidden under bandit clothing suggesting organized attack; Rance stabilized from Gift-shock after herbs; traveled to Haven at relentless pace; arrived at Collegium; Healers received him; Rolan greeted Senta.

PEND: Rance's recovery and Gift assessment; retrieving blocked memories of attack; reporting to Circle about Karsite involvement and blood magic theory; training unprecedented Gift.
